name: places/ChIJmdhW4XlZwokRNOm4mIdxPIA
formattedAddress: 124 Loisaida Ave, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 124 Loisaida Ave, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text:
This place is now Up & Up Laundromat. I have made the edit but leaving this review here until it updates:

I know I wrote a review about Supreme Laundromat over on Ave B, but my roommate (former USC Basketball Superstar) told me this place recently opened and that it is much cheaper.
Look I'll be honest with you my dear reader, life has gotten busy lately. Recently I have joined a Pickleball League and a Basketball League, started a new job, have a Google review quota to hit, have been learning guitar, swiping on Hinge, uhhhh.. eating a lot, among MANY other things. Trust me.

All this to say, I have been dropping my laundry off and paying a premium to have them do it rather than do it myself.
Judge me, fine. You know my name, not my story. You've heard what I've done, but not what I've been through.

But anyways, this place is WAY cheaper than Supreme Laundry and any other laundromat I have been to. A 19.7 lb bag of laundry cost me $25.65, where I was normally paying closer to $33 for this.
The Chinese lady at the front is also so wholesome and nice I'm obsessed.

IG @jnov_
Tiktok @jnov__

originalText.text: They don't deserve the flack they're receiving on here. I've been using their services once a week for countless months and not once have they let me down. Reliable, consistent, and ultra clean. The owner greets me with a smile upon every visit and rates are extremely reasonable. The turnaround time for same-day service can be as quick as a few hours. All of their washers are brand new as a result of an unfortunate fire a year back, but this shows in the quality of your clean laundry. If you're looking for a new laundromat in the area, look no further!

originalText.text: The owners here are very nice and thoughtful.  I have been using drop off service once a week for a year and have consistently had great service!

text.text: The owners here are very nice and thoughtful.  I have been using drop off service once a week for a year and have consistently had great service!

originalText.text: After going here for 4 years I’m taking my business elsewhere when you say you’re open at a certain time you rely on that to be the case. New owner seems to close whenever he feels like regardless of the impact on his customers.

originalText.text: Very poor service... Have tried to go back several times since they are so close to my apt but each time I’m quickly reminded why I avoid them!
